short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create unique musical compositions in Sprunki Corruptbox using intuitive touch controls and rhythm-based gameplay mechanics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Corruptbox - Enhance Your Rhythm Gaming Experience

This Chrome extension enhances your experience with Corruptbox, the innovative rhythm-based music creation game. Our extension provides useful features for Corruptbox players to improve their gameplay and creative process.

Key Features:
• Quick access to game controls and shortcuts
• Real-time BPM calculator for precise rhythm tracking
• Custom sound library management
• Enhanced visualization options for better gameplay feedback
• Convenient access to game modes and features
• Community integration for sharing compositions

Perfect for both beginners and advanced players, this extension seamlessly integrates with Corruptbox to provide a more streamlined and enjoyable gaming experience. Whether you're creating music, participating in competitions, or exploring different game modes, Corruptbox Helper is your essential companion for rhythm-based music creation.
